-- Create the new table for drop-in activity icons
CREATE TABLE "public"."drop_in_activity_icons" (
    "id" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
    "name" text NOT NULL,
    "icon" text NOT NULL,
    "created_at" timestamptz DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);

-- Enable RLS for the new table
ALTER TABLE "public"."drop_in_activity_icons" ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- Allow authenticated users to read all icons
CREATE POLICY "Allow authenticated read access to activity icons"
ON "public"."drop_in_activity_icons"
FOR SELECT
TO authenticated
USING (true);

-- Populate the table with an expanded set of default icons
INSERT INTO "public"."drop_in_activity_icons" (name, icon) VALUES
